original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 15:46:34' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 08:15:14' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 01:06:41' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 15:46:34' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 08:15:14'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 01:06:41'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
